business_flow.step 1: Click the 'New' button in Money Manager Ex to create a new transaction.
business_flow.step 3: Select cell A2 in the Excel spreadsheet.
business_flow.step 4: Press Ctrl+C in Excel to copy the selected cell's content.
business_flow.step 5: Switch back to Money Manager Ex.
business_flow.step 6: Press Ctrl+V Past the copied value into the 'Amount' field.
